statements: SELECT * FROM voice_commands;
SELECT command_text, timestamp FROM voice_commands WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, command_text FROM voice_commands ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT command_id, command_text, timestamp FROM voice_commands WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT MAX(timestamp) AS latest_command_timestamp FROM voice_commands;
SELECT command_text, user_id, timestamp FROM voice_commands WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT command_id, command_text FROM voice_commands WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01' AND command_text LIKE '%search%' ORDER BY command_id ASC;
SELECT command_id, command_text, user_id, timestamp FROM voice_commands WHERE user_id IN (100, 101, 102) ORDER BY user_id, timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM voice_commands WHERE command_text ILIKE '%play%' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY command_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT command_text, timestamp, user_id FROM voice_commands WHERE timestamp <= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM voice_commands;
SELECT command_text, timestamp FROM voice_commands ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, command_text, timestamp FROM voice_commands WHERE id = 3;
SELECT command_text, timestamp FROM voice_commands WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, command_text, timestamp FROM voice_commands WHERE command_text LIKE '%search%';
SELECT * FROM voice_commands WHERE id = 1;
SELECT command_text, timestamp FROM voice_commands WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT vc.command_text, ca.analysis_result FROM voice_commands vc JOIN command_analysis ca ON vc.id = ca.command_id;
SELECT id, command_text, timestamp FROM voice_commands WHERE command_text ILIKE '%weather%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_commands FROM voice_commands;
SELECT * FROM VoiceCommands;
SELECT command, time FROM VoiceCommands ORDER BY time DESC;
SELECT command, time, user_id FROM VoiceCommands WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT c.command, a.analysis_results FROM VoiceCommands c JOIN CommandAnalysis a ON c.id = a.command_id;
SELECT user_id, language, theme FROM UserPreferences WHERE notifications = true;
SELECT * FROM VoiceCommands WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT command, time FROM VoiceCommands WHERE id = 5;
SELECT command, time, user_id FROM VoiceCommands WHERE time >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT c.command, a.analysis_results, a.analysis_time FROM CommandAnalysis a JOIN VoiceCommands c ON a.command_id = c.id;
SELECT u.user_id, u.language, u.notifications FROM UserPreferences u WHERE u.theme = 'Dark';
SELECT * FROM VoiceCommands;
SELECT command_id, command_text FROM VoiceCommands ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_role FROM Users WHERE user_role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM CommandLogs WHERE execution_duration > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sentence_text FROM Sentences WHERE sentence_type = 'question';
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_role = 'admin';
SELECT command_text, timestamp FROM VoiceCommands WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_role FROM Users JOIN CommandLogs ON Users.user_id = CommandLogs.user_id WHERE CommandLogs.execution_duration > 10;
SELECT command_text, timestamp FROM VoiceCommands WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT sentence_text, sentence_type FROM Sentences ORDER BY sentence_type ASC, sentence_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM VoiceCommands;
SELECT command_text, command_timestamp FROM VoiceCommands WHERE user_id = '123456';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM Devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM Users WHERE user_email LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT response_text, response_timestamp FROM Responses WHERE device_id = '789012' ORDER BY response_timestamp DESC;
SELECT command_text, command_timestamp FROM VoiceCommands WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM Responses WHERE device_id = '345e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY response_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM Users WHERE user_name LIKE 'A%' AND user_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT command_text, response_text FROM VoiceCommands JOIN Responses ON VoiceCommands.command_id = Responses.command_id WHERE Response.response_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Devices WHERE device_type IN ('Mobile', 'Desktop') AND device_name NOT LIKE '%Test%';
